name: Root Of Your Nightmare
description:
If you can't move using WASD, please download the zip and run the .exe

1950's First Person Shooter

Mom and Dad have gone out for the night, leaving you home alone! Everything is great until the garden starts making weird noises. When you go outside to explore, the last thing you were expectting to see was the garden coming to life.

Mom tasked you with taking care of the garden while she was gone. 

Search the grounds for tools to defeat the monsters that have grown from the garden and make sure it's taken care of before Mom and Dad get home if you want to be left home alone again.

ALI BROCK, EMMETT MITCHELL, ASHLEY ULBRICHT, SUNITA SIEBERT, PATRICIA TEAL
